title: Rembrandt’s Philosopher in Contemplation
excerpt: Rembrandt’s Philosopher in Comtemplation was painted in 1632 and spent its first hundred years in private collections in Flanders and the Netherlands.

title: Jean-Antoine Watteau, Pleasures of the Ball (c. 1715-17)
excerpt: Painted in 1632, famously relocated to Paris in the 18th century.
